EmailTemplate.name: Application Approved
EmailTemplate.subject: Your application was successful
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Application__c.Contact_First_Name__c},
Thank you for taking the interest to submit an expression of interest form for the life chances fund.
You have been successful at this stage. Soon, you will receive an email detailing what your next steps are and, if you have submitted a development support form, detailing the outcome of your request for development funding.
In the meantime, if you have any further queries, please get back to us at lifechancesfund@biglotteryfund.org.uk with the application ID - {!Application__c.Name}.
Kind Regards, The Life Chances Fund team
